title: Finding The Characteristics
text: Since this parabola is already in standard form, we know that the vertex is $$(-3,4)$$ and that $$p=\frac{1}{2}$$. This means that the focus is $$(-2.5, 4)$$ and the directrix is $$x=-3.5$$
